sentences.sContent: "I do not know. " And thus ended their discourse.
sentences.sContent_eng: "I do not know. " And thus ended their discourse.
sentences.sCn: “我也不晓得。”就这样，他们的谈话结束了。 。

sentences.sContent: They listened to his discourse on human relations.
sentences.sContent_eng: They listened to his discourse on human relations.
sentences.sCn: 他们听他作关于人际关系的演讲。

sentences.sContent: In discourse thou must attend to what is said, and in every movement thou must observe what is doing.
sentences.sContent_eng: In discourse thou must attend to what is said, and in every movement thou must observe what is doing.
sentences.sCn: 在谈话中你必须注意所说的话，在任何活动中你都必须观察在做什么。

phrases.pCn: n. 论域；讨论或辩论的范围

trans.tranCn: 演讲， 谈话， 论文
trans.tranOther: a serious speech or piece of writing on a particular subject
